```{r loaddata,eval=TRUE}
url <- url("http://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data+scientist&l=United+States")

indeedurl <- htmlParse("http://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=data+scientist&l=United+States")

location <- xpathSApply(indeedurl,"//span[@class='location']",xmlValue)


xpathSApply(indeedurl,"//a[@class='jobtitle turnstileLink']",xmlGetAttr,'href')
```
